prompt.role: You are a senior frontend developer specializing in React, shadcn/ui, Tailwind CSS, and modern web application development.

task.title: Frontend Components
task.description: Create a complete React frontend with shadcn/ui for an e-commerce application with all major UI components.

technical_specifications.spec: React 18.2.0 with functional components and hooks
shadcn/ui for component library (built on Radix UI primitives)
React Router DOM 6.14.2 for client-side routing
Responsive design for mobile and desktop

prompt.implementation_details: Create package.json with all dependencies. Initialize shadcn/ui with `npx shadcn@latest init`. Add required shadcn/ui components (button, card, badge, input, form, navigation-menu). Build App.js with Router (no ThemeProvider needed - uses Tailwind CSS). Create Header with navigation links, cart badge using shadcn/ui components. Create Footer component using Tailwind CSS. Implement HomePage, ProductList (with mock data), ProductDetail, Cart, Login, Register. Use shadcn/ui components and Tailwind CSS for styling throughout. Ensure responsive grid layouts with Tailwind CSS classes.
prompt.test_strategy: npm install - verify dependencies resolve npm start - verify app launches Test all navigation routes Verify responsive design (resize browser) Check browser console for errors npm run build - verify production build
prompt.instructions: 1. Create frontend directory structure 2. Set up package.json with dependencies 3. Create App.js with routing 4. Build layout components (Header, Footer) 5. Implement page components with placeholder content 6. Test navigation and responsiveness
